function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 from person to person","Impact":"Rapid spread of the disease across multiple countries and territories","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, vaccination campaigns, and public health awareness","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and international travelers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in confirmed cases and deaths in specific regions","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, high mortality rates, and economic impacts","Mitigation":"Enhancing healthcare capacity, promoting social distancing, and targeted quarantine measures","Technologies":"Healthcare data analytics, remote patient monitoring, and crisis management platforms","People":"Local communities, healthcare providers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, local governments, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Higher occurrence and fatalities in certain countries","Impact":"Disparities in healthcare access, strain on public health infrastructure, and geopolitical tensions","Mitigation":"International collaboration, equitable vaccine distribution, and strengthening global health governance","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, vaccine distribution platforms, and disease surveillance networks","People":"Global population, policymakers, and international organizations","Owner":"Global health agencies, diplomatic entities, and international alliances"}]}
